name: Popup
tagline: Quick EC2 instance running OpenVPN and other tools
body:
### Popup
Quickly create an EC2 instance with a unique keypair and security group. At the moment it comes up running mosh. The intent is to add additional options: openvpn, tor, psql client, etc.

`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
